DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial design compare pharmacokinetic characteristic combination separate administration Crestor ( Rosuvastatin ) Glucodown ( Metformin SR ) . Also investigate drug interaction separate combination administration . Total number subject 36 . 6 group ( 6 1 group ) , 3 period , consecutive 5 day administration , 10 day washout 5th day administration . All subject take Crestor alone , Glucodown alone , Crestor+Glucodown combination 3 period .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics Drug Interaction Crestor Glucodown OR SR Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 20~50 yr old , healthy Korean Subjects Body weight < ideal body weight±20 % No congenital , chronic disease , No current disease Subjects diagnose include medical doctor laboratory ECG result . Subjects agree keep contraceptive method clinical trial . Subjects allergic investigational drug . Subjects medical history affect clinical trial . Hypertension ( Systolic BP ≥ 150mmHG Diastolic BP ≥ 100mmHg ) , Hypotension ( Systolic BP ≤ 100mmHg Diastolic BP ≤ 65mmHg ) Subjects take medicine recent 2~4 week . Subjects risk hypoglycemia imbalance take diet .
